item.title: NIBE Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: NIBE Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsJanuary 13, 2026NIBE Groupis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for products, services, and solutions developed or sold by NIBE Industrier AB or any of its subsidiaries; open-source projects owned by NIBE Industrier AB or any of its subsidiaries; vulnerabilities in third-party products used by NIBE Industrier AB or any of its subsidiaries which are outside the scope of another CNA; and subsidiaries of NIBE Industrier AB are listed onhttps://www.nibe.com.

item.title: Vantive Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Vantive Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsJanuary 13, 2026Vantiveis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Vantive’s commercially available products only.

item.title: ByteDance Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: ByteDance Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsJanuary 13, 2026ByteDance, Ltd.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for ByteDance issues only.

item.title: Nintendo Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Nintendo Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsJanuary 13, 2026Nintendo Co., Ltd.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for system vulnerabilities regarding the Nintendo Switch 2, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch Lite, and vulnerabilities regarding Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch applications for which Nintendo is the publisher worldwide.

item.title: TCL Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: TCL Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsJanuary 27, 2026TCL Electronics Holdings Limitedis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for TCL smart TV, smart pad, and mobile phone devices only. Projects listed onhttps://github.com/TclSecLab/CNA/blob/main/README_EN.md.

item.title: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 256 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for February 2, 2026
item.description: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 256 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for February 2, 2026blogBy CVE Program|February 3, 2026

item.title: CODRA Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: CODRA Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsFebruary 3, 2026CODRAis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for CODRA’s products and related services.

item.title: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on January 7 Now Available
item.description: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on January 7 Now AvailablenewsFebruary 10, 2026TheCVE Boardheld a teleconference meeting on January 7, 2026. Read themeeting minutes summary.

item.title: Project Black Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Project Black Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsFebruary 10, 2026Project Blackis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities discovered by Project Black that are not within another CNA’s scope.

item.title: NOTICE: Date/Time Normalization Maintenance of Historical CVE Records to Occur February 16–25, 2026
item.description: NOTICE: Date/Time Normalization Maintenance of Historical CVE Records to Occur February 16–25, 2026blogBy CVE Program|February 10, 2026TheCVE™ Programwill normalize the formatting of date/time fields across historicalCVE Recordsfrom February 16, 2026, through February 25, 2026. Asinitially announced on January 6, 2026, this maintenance will update older CVE Records so their date/time values use the same standardized ISO 8601 UTC format already in place for records published or updated since February 2025:yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.sssZ (ISO-8601, UTC)For example:2025-07-11T19:32:03.983Z
